ygData.subject: Re: Wizard what are we? (Long, hmm very long)
ygData.msgSnippet: First this game is not near maturity and all classes get tuned in, wizards need less changes that others classes but THEY NEED CORECTIONS ALSO !! All classes
ygData.messageBody:
First this game is not near maturity and all classes get tuned in, wizards
need less changes that others classes but THEY NEED CORECTIONS ALSO !! All
classes go tuned in as time pass. I understand that you like a look of
sheer force but if you think a little about you will see that mana goes out
too fast and without mana a wizard is a shell with no use damage start to
be resisted at lv where other classes are not resisted why? do you know
what is a exp loss as a wizard?.



At 21.42 25/05/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: JDThorn007@...
>
>You are all nuts. Wizards are great as they are. Want to run faster? Get
>JM boots? want to have a chance to run, use your skin series spells. want
>heals? get squad rings and potions. but nothing anyone else can get can
>match the sheer devastation we inflict. i am well past the halfway mark to
>50, and let me tell you, the smile on my face keeps getting bigger. just
>make it past the hump, around 20 your deaths become less frequent if you are
>smart and do not try soloing often. remember, nothing replaces what another
>class can do, ever.
>
>Kalleon Valkyrre
>Karana
>
